Union_City.Millburn Township Public Schools:
The Millburn Township Public Schools are a comprehensive community public school district that serves students in pre-kindergarten through twelfth grade from Millburn, in Essex County, New Jersey, United States.
As of the 2011-12 school year, the district's seven schools had an enrollment of 4,854 students and 371.8 classroom teachers (on an FTE basis), for a student–teacher ratio of 13.06:1.
The district is classified by the New Jersey Department of Education as being in District Factor Group "J", the highest of eight groupings.
